data.quote: You become what you believe.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: You take your life in your own hands, and what happens? A terrible thing, no one to blame.
data.author: Erica Jong

data.quote: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.
data.author: Leonardo da Vinci

data.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
data.author: Booker T. Washington

data.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
data.author: Joshua J. Marine

data.quote: We must believe that we are gifted for something, and that this thing, at whatever cost, must be attained.
data.author: Marie Curie

data.quote: If the wind will not serve, take to the oars.
data.author: Latin Proverb

data.quote: You can’t fall if you don’t climb.  But there’s no joy in living your whole life on the ground.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
data.author: Lao Tzu

data.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
data.author: Japanese Proverb

data.quote: Teach thy tongue to say,
and thous shalt progress.
data.author: Maimonides

data.quote: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
data.author: Plato

data.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
data.author: George Addair

data.quote: Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him, and to let him know that you trust him.
data.author: Booker T. Washington

data.quote: Ask and it will be given to you; search, and you will find; knock and the door will be opened for you.
data.author: Jesus

data.quote: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: If you hear a voice within you say “you cannot paint,” then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
data.author: Vincent Van Gogh

data.quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing.  That’s why we recommend it daily.
data.author: Zig Ziglar
